body: Obviously if the janitor has cameras installed in the women's bathroom or any bathroom in general, he would be the one to get his ass railed in jail, She might just exchange schools and so would MC therefore both have a happier ending but oh well, my guess is that she will avoid MC enough for him and the other student to date again and so end well for MC and harsh for Gal.

That was pretty good. The Gyaru had a bunch of things she could have done to stop the janitor but like she said, she's not smart enough to find another way so she sacrifices herself to keep MC safe. That's a bit tragic and heroic of her but  I think it was for the best. Janitor was actually correct. Gyaru and MC were a terrible  mismatch couple from the start.

The moment she tries to report him, is the moment both of their futures are ruined. He's gonna have enough time to leak the pictures and ruin the Couple's lives. And Japan is very strict on this, they can't brush it off even if they try. So her only choice to guarantee the Deletion of the pictures, was giving up her life to save her Boyfriend, well Ex-boyfriend...
